programme.title: Fortress America and Beloved Symbols of Britain
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke criticises Bill Clinton’s appearance at Yitzhak Rabin’s memorial service.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke discusses Clinton's visit to Oslo for a memorial service in honour of Yitzhak Rabin; and Tony Blair's banishment of hereditary peers in the House of Lords.
programme.long_synopsis: Whilst President Clinton's visit to Oslo fizzed with pomp and glory, Alistair Cooke discusses how it managed to overshadow the real reason for going; a memorial service in honour of Yitzhak Rabin. Plus, he evaluates Tony Blair's banishment of hereditary peers in the House of Lords.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
